title: Relying On Login Rewards To Play Through The Game - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Death   Game Elements   Level System   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Transported into a Game World   Weak Protagonist
author: 芙兰兰
description:
Keeping the record of the fastest clearance of several difficult RPG games, I came to the world of simulated reality inexplicably.

Once I was looking for interesting RPG games, but I found that my life was the most interesting RPG game.

What is the login reward before my eyes?

Who are these strange women?

And my first task is to stalk a girl?

There are too many complicated things to understand.

However, if I don't struggle, it seems that I will die.>
